amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to carry out the third sentence of section 107(f)(1) of the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act of 1980 (42 U.S.C. 9607(f)(1)) (relating to use of recovered sums by the United States Government without further appropriation).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 85 printed in House Report 114-683 to block the use of funds to carry out the third sentence of section 107(f )(1) (CERCLA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 257 (Roll no. 458).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A071) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 257 (Roll no. 458).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A071) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
